channel.title: Auto alcher, talker, and clicker
channel.description: Anyone have a regular autoclicker? Anbyone know where I can find a auto alcher? Anyone have an auto talker

item.title: Auto alcher, talker, and clicker
item.dc:creator: @InXile InXile
item.description:
@InXile wrote:

[php]
program ClickOnSpot;
{.include SRL/SRL.Scar}

Procedure ClickMousee;
begin
GetMousePos(x, y)
Wait(100+Random(200))
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, True)
Wait(3000+Random(1000))
end;

begin
repeat
ClickMousee;
until(False)
end.
[/php]

Here’s a simple autotalker

[php]
program AutoTalkerr;
{.Include SRL/SRL.Scar}

Const
TextToSay = ‘Hello People’;//Text you want to say
Waitt = 300;//Time to wait 1000 = 1 second

procedure TypeTextt;
begin
TypeSend(TextToSay)
Wait(Waitt+Random(100))
end;

procedure PReport;
begin
WriteLn(‘Message You Are Currently Typing:’ +IntToStr(TextToSay)+’ . ')
end;

begin
repeat
TypeTextt;
PReport;
end.
[/php]

I hope i helped

-InXile

Read full topic

I didn’t fuck up your topic, and it is almost exactly what you said. In your autoclicker topic, you said “Anyone have a regular autoclicker?”, in your auto talker thread you said “Anyone have this one?”, so I changed it to say “Anyone have an autotalker” so that it made sense, and the last one isn’t changed either.

item.title: Auto alcher, talker, and clicker
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

here is my autotalker. here is my autotalker, people said they liked it alot. and daves was really simple and didnt have any randomness in it.(no offence dave5534)

[code]{============================================================================*
| |
| NAME : Mjordans Simple Autotalker |
| WRITER : Mjordan |
| CATEGORY : Talker |
| DESCRIPTION : Types So You Wont Have To |
| USAGE : To Type For You |
| CONTACT : MSN: RunescapePasswords_@msn.com |
| AIM: mjordan7468 |
| NOTES : To Stop Script Press F12 |
| |
============================================================================
| ______ ___ __ __ |
|/\ __ \ / _ \ /_\ ______ _ ____ \ \ ______ ___ |
|\ \ \ \ / / \ \ // /\ __ \ /`'\ _____\ \ /\ __ \ /’ __`\ |
| \ \ \ \ / \ \ \ __ \ \ \ \ \ \ / /\ __ \ \ \ \ _\ \ /\ /\ \ |
| \ \ \ / \ \ \ /\ \ \ \ _\ \ \ \ \ \ _\ \ \ \ __ \ \ \ \ \ |
| \ _\ \ _\ \ \ \ _\ _\ \ _\ \ \ _\ _\ _\ _\ |
| // // \ \ \ // /_/ /,_\ //// //// |
| __ \ \ \ |
| /\ _/ / |
| \ _/ |
| __/ |
| |
============================================================================
| |
| ++++++++++++[Rs2][SRL] Autotalker [SRL][Rs2]++++++++++++ |
| |
============================================================================
| INSTRUCTIONS |
============================================================================
| |
| 1.Type In What You want To Say On Lines 59-60 |
| 2.Drag Crosshair To Runescape Client |
| 3.Press Run Button |
| |
============================================================================
| Version History |
============================================================================
| |
| Version 1.0 - Completed And Released |
| Version 2.0 - Reworked To Make It Less Dectable |
| And Made Using SRL |
| Version 2.5 - Just Added A Few Little Things Here And There |
| |
*============================================================================|
| |
| !!!I Am NOT Responsible If Any Of Your Characters Get Banned!!! |
| |
*============================================================================}

program Autotalker;
{.Include SRL/SRL.Scar}
{.include srl\srl\extended\xtext.scar}

const
//type the messages you want to say below
//try and make them different like i have
msg1 =‘white:wave:selling coal 250ea’;
msg2 =‘selling coal 250ea-mjordan’;
msg3 =‘white:coal 250gp each!!!’;
msg4 =‘selling coal~mjordan~’;

procedure credits;
begin
writeln(’<========================================================>’)
writeLn(’ Thankyou for using Mjordans’)
writeLn(’ Simple Autotalker.’)
writeLn(‘Big thanks to Rons Autotalker Where I Got Some Ideas From,’)
writeLn(‘All Of The Tuts With Which I Used That Helped Me Lots,’)
writeLn(‘And Most Of All Thanks To Kaitnieks For Creating SCAR’)
writeLn(’<========================================================>’)
end;

//procedure SendMyText(Text: String);
//end;

procedure RandomTalk;
begin
case Random(4) of
0 : SendMyText(msg1);
1 : SendMyText(msg2);//randomly types the messages. is very human like.
2 : SendMyText(msg3);
3 : SendMyText(msg4);
End;
End;

//Main Loop
begin
setupsrl;
credits;
activateclient;
wait(200);
repeat
RandomTalk;
Wait(2000+Random(3000));//change these to make the time between when you
//type your messages less or more(i suggest no less)
Until(IsFKeyDown(12))//if you want to end the script just press F12
End.[/code]

item.title: Auto alcher, talker, and clicker
item.dc:creator: @dave5534 dave5534
item.description:
@dave5534 wrote:

basic auto talker

program Auto_Talker; begin repeat Wait(200 + Random(10000)); SendKeys('runescape is fun'+chr(13)) wait(200 + Random(10000)); SendKeys('w00t almost lvl up'+chr(13)) wait(10000 + Random(10000)); SendKeys('put text here'+chr(13)) wait(9999 + Random(2534)); SendKeys('Text Here'+chr(13)) wait(5234+random(8346)); SendKeys('cyan:wave2:nothing to do'+chr(13)) until(IsFKeyDown(12))//press this to end the script end.

item.title: Auto alcher, talker, and clicker
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

autoclicker?
here i just made this, but be more spicific next time. Set up the cords of where you want the mouse to click. If your looking for a color auto clicker its the one below the first one.

[scar]program New; //will stop when F8 key is pushed down.

var
clicks: integer;

const
x1=32; //set these lines to the cords you want it to click
y1=32;

begin

repeat

wait(1000)
clickmouse(x1,y1,True)
clicks := clicks +1

until(isfkeydown(8))
Writeln(‘clicked mouse ‘+inttostr(clicks)+’ times’);

end.[/scar]

color autoclicker

[scar]//bubble attack
//yes this script is pwnage…
//http://www.addictingclips.com/Clip.aspx?key=8B9BD3BA2BEA4D21&refCode=&brand=ag

program New;
var
x,y : integer;
const
time1=20;
color=13395660;

Procedure click;
Begin
If(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,color,0,0,400,266,5))Then
Begin
ClickMouse(x,y,True);
Wait(time1);
End;
End;

begin
ActivateClient;
Repeat
Click;
Until(IsFKeyDown(3))
end.[/scar]

its used for a internet site game, just set up the color and the wait, does this help???[br][size=1]Posted at: December 22, 2006, 09:55:52 PM[/size][hr]I think I seen one in SRL public section, or in the free script sections.
Please search around before posting something like this…

EDIT: this took me 2 seconds to find…
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,4765.0.html - AutoAlcher
